@RN-AUDIT-LABEL: Add an accessibilityLabel to your accessible View
@RN-AUDIT-LABEL: Add an accessibilityLabel to your accessible View

@RN-AUDIT-NESTING: <View accessible> wraps interactive elements (e.g., Pressable/Touchable) and they are not reachable by screen readers. Consider removing "accessible" or moving the elements outside of the View.
@RN-AUDIT-LABEL: Add an accessibilityLabel
@RN-AUDIT-HINT: Add an accessibilityHint
@RN-AUDIT-STATE: <Switch> on line 32 is missing an accessibilityState. Suggested: accessibilityState={{ checked: ... }}.
@RN-AUDIT-ROLE: <ActivityIndicator> on line 36 has an invalid accessibilityRole "spinner".  Suggested: "progressbar".
@RN-AUDIT-STATE: Add an accessibilityState to a11y-test/src/components/Checkbox.tsx. Suggested: accessibilityState={{ checked: ... }}.
